title: The Freelancer
overview: Based on the book 'A Ticket To Syria', ex-Cop turned mercenary Avinash Kamath aka 'The Freelancer', takes up the daunting mission of rescuing Aliya, a newly married girl trapped in a war-torn Syria against the backdrop of growing ISIS terrorism

tv.episodeOverview: Aliya panics after Mohsin reveals his radical plans and tries to escape. Dr. Khan warns Avinash about rescuing his friend's daughter.
